title: Narges Mohammadi Sentenced to 17 Years in Iran After New Ruling

Vonn lost control within moments of leaving the start house, clipping a gate with her right shoulder and pinwheeling down the slope before ending up awkwardly on her back, her skis criss-crossed below her and her screams ringing out soon after medical personnel arrived.
